usx.para: The Preaching of John the Baptist

This is the Good News about Jesus Christ, the Son of God. 1.1: Some manuscripts do not have the Son of God. Adam 3.20: Adam: This name in Hebrew means “all human beings.” named his wife Eve, 3.20: Eve: This name sounds similar to the Hebrew word for “living,” which is rendered in this context as “human beings.” because she was the mother of all human beings. whoever believes in me should drink. As the scripture says, ‘Streams of life-giving water will pour out from his side.’” 7.38: Jesus' words in verses 37-38 may be translated: “Whoever is thirsty should come to me and drink. 38 As the scripture says, ‘Streams of life-giving water will pour out ...’” Él es el resplandor glorioso de Dios,1.3: Resplandor: Cf.
